title: iOS & Web App Developer Needed to Accelerate Development of RealMetric Analytics App
description:
About RealMetric Analytics & The App
RealMetric Analytics is a cutting-edge football data analytics company, providing elite clubs, scouts, and decision-makers with powerful insights through advanced player scouting, team analysis, and data-driven decision-making tools. See the full design here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zP2IW9a2RFE&t=1s

Our RealMetric Analytics App is a high-performance scouting and analytics platform designed to:
‚úÖ Deliver in-depth player insights based on advanced data analytics
‚úÖ Provide real-time player alerts and customized watchlists
‚úÖ Enable advanced scouting tools for identifying transfer opportunities
‚úÖ Offer team analysis and comparative performance metrics
‚úÖ Support clubs and agencies in making data-driven recruitment decisions

The app is already in active development, with 1/3 of the pages completed and live, but we need to accelerate progress significantly while maintaining top-tier quality.

Project Context & Scope
1Ô∏è‚É£ Designs Are Ready ‚Äì No New Work Required

The UI/UX for version 1.0 is fully finalized and implemented.
Version 2.0 designs are being finalized, and there is no need for major design work‚Äîonly small adjustments during development as needed.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Development Progress & Need for Speed

1/3 of the app is developed and live, but the current development speed is too slow.
We need a developer who can rapidly execute the remaining work while maintaining code quality.
Speedy delivery is the #1 priority for version 1.0 and 2.0.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Firebase Backend ‚Äì Infrastructure is Fully Set Up

The app is fully integrated with Firebase, so no backend work is required.
You‚Äôll be working primarily on front-end implementation and Firebase integration, ensuring seamless connectivity with Firestore, Authentication, Cloud Functions, and Firebase Storage.
The role requires collaboration with our current developer to maintain consistency and ensure smooth transitions.
4Ô∏è‚É£ App Platforms & Web Integration

The app is being developed for iOS (mobile & tablet) using Swift & SwiftUI.
We also want to integrate a web app version in the future, so experience with React, Next.js, or similar frameworks is a plus.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Quality & Speed are Critical

Version 1.0 is already halfway done‚Äîwe need faster progress without sacrificing quality.
Version 2.0 development will start soon, and we want a structured, high-quality approach.
6Ô∏è‚É£ Long-Term Opportunities

Beyond this project, we have ambitious plans for future updates (Version 3.0+), an Android version, and additional advanced scouting and analytics features.
If you deliver high-quality work efficiently, this could lead to a long-term role in shaping the future of our platform.
Who We‚Äôre Looking For
Required Skills & Experience
üîπ iOS Development (Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C)
üîπ Strong experience integrating Firebase (Firestore, Authentication, Cloud Functions, Firebase Storage)
üîπ Experience with mobile UI/UX implementation based on pre-designed layouts
üîπ Ability to integrate Firebase APIs seamlessly with a mobile app
üîπ Familiarity with web app development (React, Next.js, or similar) is a plus
üîπ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
üîπ Ability to work collaboratively with the existing developer
üîπ Efficient coding skills‚Äîwe need fast progress without compromising quality
üîπ Experience working in fast-paced, high-performance projects

Ideal Candidate
‚úÖ Can jump into an ongoing project and quickly pick up the work
‚úÖ Delivers fast results while ensuring top-tier quality
‚úÖ Comfortable working with pre-existing designs & Firebase backend
‚úÖ Takes ownership and proactively solves problems
‚úÖ Open to long-term collaboration for future updates & expansion

How to Apply
To be considered for this role, you must:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Confirm that you have read and fully understood this job description.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Explain how you would approach speeding up development while maintaining quality.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Provide examples of past iOS projects using Firebase you've worked on.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Share your experience working with an existing development team and collaborating on ongoing projects.

üö® Automated applications will NOT be considered. Only personalized applications that directly address the job details will be reviewed. Your application must be supplemented by your similar previous projects and a specific cover letter, explaining why you're the best candidate for this projectüö®

If you are ready to move fast, deliver high-quality code, and work on a cutting-edge football data platform, we want to hear from you! üöÄ

title: Experienced Mobile App Developer Needed for AI-Powered Expense Tracking App
description:
We are seeking a skilled mobile app developer to build a feature-rich expense tracking app tailored for the Chinese market. The app must seamlessly integrate with WeChat Pay and Alipay, automatically recording transactions (date, amount, merchant, time, etc.) when users make payments.

This app should support multiple account books, AI-powered categorization, advanced search, tagging, and collaborative expense management.

Key Features:

1. Payment Integration (WeChat Pay & Alipay)

‚úÖ Automatically logs transactions when users pay via WeChat Pay or Alipay.
‚úÖ Captures essential details: transaction date, amount, merchant, time, etc.
‚úÖ Ensures high accuracy in data retrieval and categorization.

2. Multiple Account Books & Sharing

‚úÖ Users can create multiple expense books (e.g., Personal, Business, Family).
‚úÖ Ability to share specific books with other users for collaborative tracking.

3. AI-Powered Auto-Categorization

‚úÖ AI automatically categorizes expenses into relevant spending categories.
‚úÖ Users can manually adjust categories if needed.

4. Smart Expense Input for Other Payment Methods

‚úÖ If a user pays with cash, bank transfer, credit card, the app automatically prompts them to enter transaction details immediately.

5. Import & Export Transactions

‚úÖ Users can import transactions (CSV, bank statements).
‚úÖ Export expense reports in Excel, PDF, or other formats.

6. AI-Based Insights & Reports

‚úÖ Visual reports & analytics on spending trends.
‚úÖ Optional AI-powered text analysis for financial insights and recommendations.

7. Search Transactions Feature üîç

‚úÖ Users can search transactions by:
‚Ä¢ Date
‚Ä¢ Merchant
‚Ä¢ Payment method
‚Ä¢ Amount
‚Ä¢ Notes
‚Ä¢ Tags

8. Tagging System üè∑Ô∏è

‚úÖ Users can add custom tags to transactions for easier tracking (e.g., #Business, #Food, #Shopping).
‚úÖ Filter transactions by tags for better expense organization.

9. Editable Transactions & Attachments

‚úÖ Users can edit transaction records anytime.
‚úÖ Attach receipts, invoices, or photos to transactions.

10. AI Customer Support
‚úÖ User contact customer support if needed

Technical Requirements:

üîπ Experience with WeChat Pay & Alipay API integration.
üîπ Proficiency in iOS & Android app development (React Native, Flutter, or Native).
üîπ Strong backend development skills (Node.js, Firebase, or other relevant stacks).
üîπ Experience with AI/ML for auto-categorization and text analysis.
üîπ Knowledge of data encryption & security best practices to protect financial data.
üîπ Familiarity with cloud storage & real-time database synchronization for shared expense books.

Additional Details:

üìå The app should have a user-friendly UI optimized for the Chinese market.
üìå Must comply with Chinese data privacy regulations.
üìå Developers with experience in Chinese fintech applications are preferred.

üöÄ If you have expertise in WeChat Pay & Alipay integration and are excited to develop an AI-powered finance app, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

üîπ Please provide:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Portfolio of similar projects
2Ô∏è‚É£ Your estimated timeline & budget proposal

title: IOS and Android APP Developers to work on a "Reservation System" for an online food delivery APP
description:
Seeking two (2) IOS and Android APP Developers to work with our Development Team to complete a Reservation System on our Customer APP for an online food delivery application.

Must have experience in building a reservation system and expertise in the areas listed below. Estimating work required to be up to ~80 manhours for each Application with work to be completed on an URGENT basis e.g. +/- 1 week.

For Android Developer:

### 1. **Knowledge and Skills:**
   - **Programming Languages:**
     - **Java** or **Kotlin** (Kotlin is now the preferred language for Android development).
   - **Android SDK (Software Development Kit):** Understanding of the Android SDK is essential to build apps.
   - **Android Studio:** The official IDE (Integrated Development Environment) for Android app development.
   - **XML (Extensible Markup Language):** Used for designing the UI (User Interface) of the app.
   - **API Integration:** Knowledge of working with APIs to handle data exchange between apps and external services.
   - **Version Control:** Familiarity with Git for managing code versioning and collaboration.

### 2. **Development Tools:**
   - **Android Studio:** A powerful IDE for building Android apps, providing features like a code editor, emulators, and debugging tools.
   - **Gradle:** A build automation tool used for managing dependencies, building, and packaging the app.
   - **Android Emulator:** For testing the app without needing a physical device.
   - **Firebase:** For backend services like authentication, databases, and cloud storage.

### 3. **Knowledge of Android Frameworks and Libraries:**
   - **Jetpack Components:** Libraries for UI and app architecture (e.g., LiveData, ViewModel, Navigation, Room, etc.).
   - **Material Design:** Google's design system for creating user-friendly, beautiful UIs.
   - **Retrofit/Volley:** Libraries for making HTTP requests.
   - **Room:** An SQLite database library to manage local data storage.

### 4. **App Architecture:**
   - **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** or **MVP (Model-View-Presenter):** Popular architectural patterns in Android development.
   - **Clean Architecture:** Helps structure code in a way that's maintainable and scalable.

### 5. **Testing:**
   - **Unit Testing:** Tools like JUnit for testing the logic of your app.
   - **UI Testing:** Espresso for UI testing, ensuring the user interface works as expected.
   - **Mockito:** For mocking objects in unit tests.

### 6. **Understanding of Android Lifecycle:**
   - **Activity Lifecycle:** Knowing the different stages in an app‚Äôs lifecycle (e.g., `onCreate()`, `onResume()`, etc.).
   - **Fragment Lifecycle:** Managing fragments properly to ensure proper behavior and performance.

### 7. **Knowledge of Databases:**
   - **SQLite:** A lightweight relational database engine used to store data locally in Android apps.
   - **Firebase Firestore/Realtime Database:** For cloud-based real-time databases.

### 8. **Publishing & Distribution:**
   - **Google Play Console:** Understanding how to publish an app to the Google Play Store, including handling app versions, updates, and pricing.
   - **App Signing:** Ensuring the app is securely signed with a private key before uploading to the Play Store.

### 9. **Security:**
   - **Secure Storage:** Knowledge of how to securely store sensitive information such as user data and passwords (e.g., using Android Keystore).
   - **Data Encryption:** Implementing encryption for sensitive data.
   - **Permissions:** Managing and requesting permissions for various device features like camera, location, etc.

### 10. **Additional Skills:**
   - **Understanding of RESTful APIs** for connecting to web services.
   - **Knowledge of GitHub or other Git-based platforms** for collaboration and code management.
   - **Experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)** pipelines to automate testing and deployment.

----------------------------------
IOS Developer requirements:

### 1. **Knowledge and Skills:**
   - **Programming Languages:**
     - **Swift**: The primary language for modern iOS development.
     - **Objective-C**: Older codebases might require familiarity with Objective-C, although Swift is now preferred.
   - **iOS SDK (Software Development Kit)**: Understanding the iOS SDK, which provides the necessary tools and APIs for app development.
   - **Xcode**: The official IDE for iOS development, containing a suite of tools for building, testing, and deploying iOS apps.
   - **Auto Layout**: Essential for building responsive UIs that adapt to different screen sizes and orientations.
   - **UIKit**: The framework for building the user interface in iOS apps.
   - **SwiftUI**: An alternative to UIKit, SwiftUI is a declarative framework for building UIs using Swift.
   
### 2. **Development Tools:**
   - **Xcode**: The integrated development environment (IDE) for iOS development, which includes a code editor, interface builder, simulator, and debugging tools.
   - **CocoaPods** or **Swift Package Manager (SPM)**: Dependency managers for adding third-party libraries or frameworks to your iOS projects.
   - **Simulator**: iOS simulators within Xcode for testing apps without requiring a physical device.
   - **TestFlight**: A platform for distributing beta versions of apps to testers.

### 3. **App Design & User Interface:**
   - **Human Interface Guidelines (HIG)**: Apple‚Äôs design principles that ensure your app follows best practices and provides an excellent user experience.
   - **SwiftUI**: A framework for building modern UIs in a declarative way, which is gaining popularity for new iOS projects.
   - **Storyboards and XIBs**: Legacy UI design tools that still play a role in many iOS projects.

### 4. **Knowledge of iOS Frameworks and Libraries:**
   - **UIKit**: For building and managing interfaces and responding to user interactions.
   - **Core Data**: Apple‚Äôs framework for managing app data and persistence.
   - **Core Animation**: Used for handling animations and transitions.
   - **Core Location**: For accessing the device‚Äôs location data.
   - **Push Notifications (APNs)**: To send notifications to users.
   - **MapKit**: For displaying maps and adding location-based features.
   - **CloudKit**: Apple‚Äôs framework for managing cloud-based data storage.

### 5. **App Architecture:**
   - **MVC (Model-View-Controller)**: The traditional design pattern for iOS apps, though newer patterns like **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** and **VIPER** are gaining traction.
   - **Clean Architecture**: Helps structure your app's codebase for maintainability and scalability.
   - **Combine Framework**: A framework for reactive programming and managing asynchronous events in a declarative way.

### 6. **Testing:**
   - **Unit Testing**: Familiarity with **XCTest** for testing business logic.
   - **UI Testing**: **XCUITest** for automating UI tests to ensure the interface behaves as expected.
   - **Mocking**: Tools like **Cedar** or **OCMock** for mocking objects in unit tests.

### 7. **Understanding of iOS Lifecycle:**
   - **View Controller Lifecycle**: Managing the states of view controllers in the app (e.g., `viewDidLoad()`, `viewWillAppear()`).
   - **App Lifecycle**: Understanding how apps transition between foreground and background states, managing resources, and handling interruptions (e.g., phone calls).

### 8. **App Distribution:**
   - **App Store Connect**: The platform for managing app submissions, updates, and analytics.
   - **App Store Guidelines**: Familiarity with Apple's guidelines for app approval.
   - **Code Signing and Provisioning Profiles**: Essential for building and distributing apps through the App Store or for internal distribution.
   - **TestFlight**: To distribute beta versions of apps and get feedback before releasing the final version.

### 9. **Security:**
   - **Keychain Services**: For storing sensitive information securely, such as passwords or authentication tokens.
   - **Data Encryption**: Knowledge of how to encrypt sensitive data stored locally on the device.
   - **App Transport Security (ATS)**: Understanding of security protocols for ensuring secure network connections.

### 10. **Additional Skills:**
   - **Git and Version Control**: Familiarity with Git for source code management, collaborating with teams, and version control.
   - **Networking (REST APIs)**: Knowledge of how to work with APIs (e.g., JSON, REST) to connect the app to back-end services.
   - **Core Animation and 3D**: For more advanced UI effects and animations.
   - **Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)**: Automating the build, testing, and deployment processes with tools like **Jenkins**, **CircleCI**, or **GitHub Actions**.
   
### 11. **Deployment & Maintenance:**
   - **App Store Review Process**: Understanding the submission and approval process to get your app published.
   - **App Analytics**: Using **Firebase Analytics**, **Mixpanel**, or **Apple Analytics** to track user behavior and app performance.
   - **App Updates**: How to push updates to apps and handle app versioning.

### 12. **Additional Considerations:**
   - **Push Notifications**: Implementing Apple Push Notification Service (APNs) for sending push notifications.
   - **Cloud Storage**: Using Apple‚Äôs **CloudKit** or third-party services (e.g., Firebase, AWS) for cloud storage.

   - **App Monetization**: Knowledge of monetization techniques like in-app purchases, subscriptions, or ads (e.g., using AdMob or iAd).

### 13. **Keeping Up-to-Date:**
   - **Apple Developer Program**: Access to documentation, beta software, and other resources.
   - **WWDC (Apple Worldwide Developers Conference)**: Attending (or following) the annual conference for new updates on iOS development and platform changes.

title: Mobile App Development for Nightlife Experience
description:
We are seeking a skilled developer to create NextUp, a web-based mobile application designed to enhance young adults' nightlife and event-going experiences. The ideal candidate will have experience in mobile app development, UI/UX design, and integrating social features. You will be responsible for building a user-friendly interface and ensuring seamless functionality across various devices. If you are passionate about nightlife and technology, we want to hear from you!

Project Overview:

Objective: Create a polished, user-friendly MVP that allows users to search for, discover, and RSVP to events while interacting with features such as crowdsourced playlists and real-time social engagement.

Core Features:
User Registration & Authentication: Support for email/phone sign-up and social logins (Google, Facebook, Apple).

Event Discovery: Searchable event listings with filters (e.g., event type, music played, location, time).
Event Details & Social Feed: Display event details, host profiles, and live updates (RSVPs, song requests, etc.).

Interactive Features: A crowdsourced DJ experience where users can vote on songs they'd like to hear the most and influence the playlist. During-event features like voting on snacks, which song should play next, etc.

Basic Analytics: For hosts to track event engagement.

Technical Requirements:
Ideally built using a cross-platform framework (React Native, Flutter, or similar).
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Integration with third-party APIs (e.g., for social logins, possibly music streaming services).

Project Timeline:
Expected completion within 2.5-3 months.

Budget:
$3,000-3,500 (fixed price), with milestone-based payments.

Intellectual Property & NDA:
All work must be delivered on a work-for-hire basis.
You will be required to sign a non-disclosure and work-for-hire agreement ensuring all intellectual property rights are transferred to us.

Candidate Requirements:
Proven experience in mobile/web app development, particularly for social or event-based platforms.
Strong portfolio demonstrating end-to-end project development.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
Familiarity with integrating real-time features and third-party APIs.
Experience with agile development and milestone delivery.

Further details to be provided after response.

title: iOS/Android Mobile App Developer for Oracle MVP
description:
Compensation: Negotiable based on experience
Project Duration: Short-term (MVP Development), potential for long-term engagement

About the Project

The mobile app "Oracle" is a voice-based AI guide designed to be a deeply personalized companion for users, offering mentorship, support, and insights based on contextual understanding. This MVP will be built using Cursor and OpenAI‚Äôs APIs to enable voice-based interaction, adaptive responses, and smart monetization features.

We are looking for a skilled AI Developer with experience in OpenAI API integration, voice-to-text processing, conversational AI, and frontend development to build the leanest possible version of this product while maintaining high engagement and user experience.

Responsibilities

Develop and integrate OpenAI Whisper API for speech-to-text conversion (voice input processing).

Implement GPT-4 API for context-aware, adaptive conversational AI logic.

Utilize OpenAI TTS API for text-to-speech responses to create a fully voice-based experience.

Implement short-term session memory within GPT-4‚Äôs context window to allow fluid, human-like conversations.

Design a smart paywall that triggers after the Oracle completes its initial discovery phase (~5 minutes of conversation).

Integrate Stripe or RevenueCat API for subscription-based monetization.

Develop a lightweight frontend using React/Next.js in Cursor to facilitate interactions.

Optimize the AI system for low-latency, high-quality responses.

Required Skills & Experience

AI & Backend Development

Strong experience with OpenAI APIs (Whisper, GPT-4, TTS).

Knowledge of AI-driven conversational models and contextual adaptation.

Ability to fine-tune system prompts and API calls for optimal performance.

Frontend & UI Development

Proficiency in React/Next.js (required for Cursor-based development).

Experience building clean, minimal UIs for AI-powered applications.

Understanding of voice interaction UX and how to design for seamless conversations.

Payments & Monetization

Experience integrating Stripe or RevenueCat for subscriptions/paywalls.

Understanding of user retention & engagement tactics related to paywalls.

General Requirements

Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work autonomously.

Prior experience building AI-driven applications.

Ability to communicate technical concepts clearly.

Familiarity with Cursor as a development environment (preferred but not required).

Nice-to-Have Skills

Experience in AI fine-tuning and persistent memory systems.

Background in chatbot development, NLP, or voice AI.

Knowledge of gamification mechanics to enhance engagement.

Why Join Us?

Exciting AI-first project at the intersection of personalization, voice AI, and self-improvement.

Opportunity to build an innovative, high-engagement product from the ground up.

Flexible, remote work with a fast-moving startup mindset.

Potential for long-term collaboration as we scale beyond the MVP.

How to Apply

If you're passionate about building intelligent, voice-driven AI applications and want to be part of a project that helps users gain deeper self-awareness, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Please send:

A message explaining why you‚Äôre a great fit.
+
Expected timeline & availability.

Let's build something groundbreaking together! üöÄ

title: React Native Features
description:
The app is a trip creation app and the codebase is clean and easy to work with, I can show you before you give an answer. These are the two features/bugs we need:
1. To coincide with the Privacy, when someone adds you to a trip, even if you are already their friend on VacayCraze, before you can just be added you still HAVE to accept that trip (aka: if Tanner adds Antonino to a trip, Antonino would have to login and accept the trip request from within his notifications bell on the home screen). This will stop celebrities or influencers from being added to a bunch of crazy peoples trips without any say.
2. Melissa created a trip and added Brad, he did not get notified that he was added to the trip and did not get an option to accept or deny being added. This also occurs when Brad adds Melissa to a trip. Someone should be notified when a trip is created and have the option to accept/deny (we have a notification backend api but not an accept/deny feature)

title: Environment set for Android and IOS
description:
Create Environments for IOS and Android in my PC and cloud with sample code with CI/CD as well.

Development (Dev) Environment: Local development(Runs on Windows Laptop).

Testing (QA/Staging): Testing new features before release(Runs on a cloud server or local VM)

Production (Prod): Live environment for real users(Runs on AWS/GCP/Digitalocean)

üìå A. Development (Local Setup on Windows)
‚úÖ Run Flutter app locally for development
‚úÖ Run Spring Boot APIs on your Windows laptop
‚úÖ Use PostgreSQL locally for database development
‚úÖ Use Firebase for authentication & push notifications

Install the Required Development Tools on Windows

1) Flutter SDK:Android & iOS frontend development
2) Android Studio: Android Emulator & Debugging.
3) VS Code / IntelliJ IDEA : Code Editor for Flutter & Backend.
4) Java JDK 17+: Required for Spring Boot
5) PostgreSQL: Local database setup.
6) Redis: Caching & Session Storage
7) Docker (Optional): Virtualized backend environment
8) Git (Version Control): Managing codebase
9) Postman: API Testing

üìå B. Testing Environment (QA/Staging)
‚úÖ Used by testers to find bugs before release
‚úÖ Runs in a separate cloud or local VM
‚úÖ Separate database to prevent data corruption

üìå How to Set Up the Testing Environment
1) Host on a free cloud service like Render.com or Railway.app
2) Use a separate PostgreSQL instance for testing
3) Run API on a different port.

üìå C. Production Environment (Live Users)
‚úÖ Hosted on AWS/GCP/DigitalOcean
‚úÖ Uses PostgreSQL with backup & scaling
‚úÖ SSL Secured API Server

üìå Steps to Deploy Production
1Ô∏è‚É£ Deploy Backend to AWS/GCP

title: Arabic Funeral Services App - Android, iOS & Web Development
description:
Project Title:
‚ÄúSeeking an Expert Arabic-Speaking Developer for a Funeral Services App Targeting Saudi Arabia‚Äù
________________________________________
Project Overview:
We are looking for a highly skilled Arabic-speaking developer to develop a funeral services mobile application targeting users in Saudi Arabia. The application will be available in Arabic, English, and Urdu, ensuring accessibility for both locals and expatriates.
The project includes a mobile app for iOS & Android along with a web-based admin panel for management.
________________________________________
Key Features
Mobile App (Android & iOS)
- Arabic UI with full English & Urdu language support.
- Focused on Saudi Arabia, with funeral listings categorized by region & city.
- User Registration via OTP authentication (Phone number & email).
- Funeral Management ‚Äì users can register funeral details (deceased info, prayer location, burial time).
- Push Notifications ‚Äì users receive instant alerts for funeral prayer times & burials.
- Google Maps API Integration ‚Äì locate mosques, cemeteries, and service providers in Saudi Arabia.
- Advanced Search System ‚Äì search funerals by location, mosque, cemetery, or name.
- Condolences System ‚Äì users can send pre-written condolence messages in Arabic, English, and Urdu.
- Service Providers Directory ‚Äì mortuary workers, grave diggers, and transport providers can register their services.
- Paid Advertisements System ‚Äì service providers can promote their services.
Web-Based Admin Panel
- Admin dashboard in Arabic for managing funerals & user data.
- Manage funeral-related advertisements.
- Send real-time notifications to users about upcoming funerals.
- View reports & analytics on funerals across Saudi Arabia.
- Role-Based Access Control ‚Äì Super Admin, Mosque Managers, Service Providers.
________________________________________
Required Technical Skills:
- Mobile App Development: Flutter or React Native.
- Web Development: React.js or Vue.js.
- Backend Development: Node.js (Express) or Django (Python).
- Database Management: PostgreSQL or MongoDB.
- Google Maps API for geolocation services.
- Push Notification System (Firebase or OneSignal).
- OTP-based authentication integrated with Saudi Nafath (ŸÜŸÅÿßÿ∞) system.
________________________________________
Contract Type & Development Timeline:
- Fixed-Price Contract with Milestone-based payments.
- Estimated Timeline: 3 months, with an MVP launch within 1 month.
________________________________________
Budget:
- 1500 US$ (negotiable based on expertise and proposal quality).
________________________________________
Application Requirements:
- Portfolio of relevant Arabic-based or service-based apps.
- Technical breakdown on development strategy.
- Estimated timeline for each phase.
- Fluency in Arabic (Mandatory) for smooth communication.
üî¥ Non-Arabic-speaking applicants will NOT be considered due to language requirements.
________________________________________
Final Goal:
To create a modern, Arabic-focused funeral services application for Saudi Arabia, helping communities digitally manage funeral services with ease.
-------

title: iOS & Android App Developer Needed
description:
We are looking for an experienced iOS and Android app developer to build a Publisher App that provides users with:

‚úÖ A mini-dashboard with key metrics
‚úÖ Link creation and management
‚úÖ Communication through tickets

The app will retrieve data via API, and we will provide all necessary API endpoints for seamless integration. The app will only be available when the user is online.

Key Requirements:

- Experience in iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin or Flutter/React Native)
- API integration skills (RESTful API, authentication, data retrieval)
- User authentication via email/login and third-party services**
- Push notifications setup
- Clean and scalable code following best practices
- Ability to implement UI/UX designs (provided in Figma)
- Familiarity with DTAP environments (Development, Testing, Acceptance, Production)

Core Features to Implement:

üìå Authentication & Login (email/third-party login, credential auto-fill, first-time setup prompts)
üìå Navigation & UI Components (hamburger menu, sidebar, date picker, notifications, modals)
üìå Dashboard (Revenue & Engagement metrics, transactions, charts, customizable panels)
üìå Transactions List (Infinite scrolling, filters, campaign details, statuses)
üìå Link Management (Generate new links, link history, campaigns)
üìå Ticketing System (Creating, managing, and responding to support tickets)
üìå Push Notifications (For transactions, messages, campaign updates)

Additional Notes:

- We will provide the API and endpoints for integration
- Designs & prototypes are available in Figma
- The app will utilize the Nexus Nested Design System
- The Dazzle icon pack will be used and needs to be purchased for legal use
- More detailed information will be shared after signing an NDA

Timeline & Budget:

‚è≥ Deadline: 2-3 weeks
üí∞ Budget: Open to proposals, competitive pricing expected

Required Application Materials:

To be considered for this project, please provide:
‚úî Proof of skills and knowledge (e.g., GitHub, code samples, technical assessments)
‚úî References from previous clients or employers
‚úî Examples of apps you have developed (App Store / Play Store links preferred)
‚úî Estimated timeline & cost breakdown
‚úî Tech stack proposal (Swift/Kotlin vs. Flutter/React Native)

üöÄ Future Opportunities: If this project is successfully completed, there will be at least two more app development projects offered. We are looking for a reliable developer / Agency to establish a long-term collaboration.

Looking forward to working together to bring this project to life! üöÄ

title: Game App Development - Car Racing Game (Unlimited Loop) for Kids (9-10 years old)
description:
I am looking for an experienced app developer to create a simple yet engaging car racing game for mobile, aimed primarily at kids aged 9-10 years old. The core objective of this app is to create a fun and addictive experience while incorporating a monetization strategy through ads. The game should feature an unlimited road loop and increase in speed to keep players engaged, with obstacles that slow down the car.

Game Requirements:
Core Gameplay: A car racing game where the player drives a car on an infinite road loop.
Speed Mechanics: The speed of the car should gradually increase from 1 to 2 km, adding to the challenge as the game progresses.
Bumper Obstacles: There will be bumpers or obstacles that reduce the speed of the car when hit.
Endless Loop: The game continues indefinitely, offering endless playtime and keeping players engaged.
Simple UI: Clean, colorful, and child-friendly design with basic controls that are easy for kids to understand.
Target Audience: The game should be designed for kids aged 9-10 years old with age-appropriate graphics and difficulty level.
Monetization through Ads: The primary motive for creating this game is to run ads, so the app should support ad integrations (e.g., interstitial ads or banners) for monetization.

Milestones & Payment:
The development process will be divided into two milestones with the following payment structure:

+First Milestone (20%): At the end of the first phase, which includes the initial version of the game (basic mechanics, game flow, and initial ad integration).
+Second Milestone (80%): Upon the final delivery of the game (full app functionality, tested, and ready for deployment on app stores).

Timeline:
Project Duration: The app should be completed and fully functional within 3 months.

Additional Notes:
Testing: You will be responsible for thoroughly testing the game and fixing any bugs.
Budget: The budget is tight, so efficiency and cost-effectiveness are crucial.
Communication: Regular updates on progress are expected throughout the development process.
Ad Integration: The app's monetization through ads is a key priority, so ads should be integrated seamlessly.

If you're confident in your ability to handle this project from start to finish, including development, testing, and ensuring monetization through ads, and can create a child-friendly game experience, I'd love to hear from you!
skills: ['UX & UI', 'Android App Development', 'Android', 'In-App Purchases', 'Mobile App Design', 'iOS', 'Mobile App Development', 'Flutter']

title: Android Developer Needed for Scraping Google Discover Feed (PoC Development)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Android developer to help us automate the scrolling and capturing of the Google Discover feed on an Android device. This Proof of Concept (PoC) aims to determine the feasibility of screen recording or screenshot-based scraping while automating the scrolling process.

The solution should be designed for one specific Android device but should be scalable and adaptable if applied to another device in the future.

Possible Solution:

Project Scope:
The goal is to develop an application or service that can:
- Open the Google Discover feed.
- Scroll through the Google Discover feed programmatically.
- Capture the scrolling feed via screen recording or periodic screenshots.
- Ensure the approach can be scaled to work on other Android devices with minimal adjustments.

Ideal Candidate:
- Experience with Android automation (UIAutomator, Accessibility Services, MediaProjection API).
- Strong understanding of Android security policies & workarounds.
- Familiarity with touch event injection, ADB-based automation, or WebView alternatives.
- Ability to think outside the box to bypass constraints in a legal & ethical manner.

If you have experience in Android automation and are confident in tackling this challenge, apply now with your proposed approach or previous relevant experience

What is Google Discover?

Refer to this:https://yoast.com/app/uploads/2020/10/google-discover-app.mp4

I‚Äôm looking for a developer (or team) to build a social crowd-sharing mobile app that helps users find, review, and share halal restaurants and caf√©s. Users should be able to post photos/videos, rate experiences, vote on halal elements, and filter locations based on these factors.

title: React Native Developer for Climbing Analytics Feature | $25/hr
description:
Job Description:

We‚Äôre looking for an experienced React Native developer to help build a new climbing analytics feature for St≈çkt, a climbing app that allows gyms and climbers to create and track climbs on spray walls. This role is also open to a full stack developer if they fit the tech stack we use (react native + python django)

This feature will provide gyms with detailed insights into how their members use the walls, including:
- Average climbing grades on their wall
- Heatmap visualization of the most used holds
- Climbing activity trends
- Setting accuracy analysis

It will be part of a premium St≈çkt Pro subscription offering (already exists, we just want to add to it)

Responsibilities:
- Develop and integrate this feature into our existing React Native codebase
- Implement data visualization components (charts, graphs, heatmaps)
- Ensure a smooth user experience and performance optimization
- Collaborate with our team for API integration and testing

Requirements:
- Intermediate/Senior experience in React Native
- Fluent English (for communication and documentation)
- Experience working with data visualization (react native charting libraries)
- Knowledge of best practices for performance (reanimated, gesture handler etc)
- Clean code practices
- Bonus (Nice to Have, but Not Required):
- Experience with Python Django (our backend stack)
- Experience with climbing, fitness, or sports-related apps
- Prior work on dashboards or analytics features

Why Join Us?
If this project goes well, we‚Äôre keen to continue working together on a long-term basis. We're looking for someone who enjoys building high-quality features and wants to be part of an exciting app that serves the climbing community!

Pay: $25/hr
Hours: Flexible, project-based
Start Date: ASAP

Using AI tools like Cursor etc is recommended to increase productivity and code standards but candidate MUST have underlying knowledge and skill in mobile dev and react native.

If this sounds like a good fit, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

title: 2 FlutterFlow Web Pages, Invoice and Estimate
description:
Build 2 web pages using FlutterFlow, one for an Invoice and one for an Estimate, along with some integration modifications to the current FlutterFlow app (iOS and Android).

Both pages require modification of the existing Flutter initiation from within the FlutterFlow app when a button "Send" is clicked.  This opens the user's SMS interface with a message and a link to the we based document (either Estimate or Invoice).  

Estimate: When the recipient clicks on the link, they see an estimate for services (like plumbing or painting) and can hit an Approve button.  This gets saved to the Firebase database.

Invoice: When the recipient clicks on the link, they see an invoice for services (like plumbing or painting) and can hit one of the payment buttons.  The first release will start with simple integration for the following: Venmo, PayPal and Zelle.  When the user clicks on any of these, it will open up the payment app in question with 3 pieces of information: the receiving person's identification, the amount and a description (which contains the invoice ID concatenated with the textual description of the project).

This should be a relatively simple project for anyone with solid FlutterFlow experience, taking just a few days.  If you think it will take you weeks, you wouldn't be a good fit for this project.
skills: ['Web Development', 'FlutterFlow', 'Payment Functionality', 'React', 'WordPress', 'Firebase', 'Web Design', 'UX & UI Design', 'Chart.js', 'Web Application', 'PHP', 'JavaScript']

title: Mobile App Developer Needed for Smart Home & Utility Management Ap
description:
We are looking for an experienced front-end mobile app developer to build a smart home and utility management app for iOS and Android. The app will be template-based, dynamically populated using a JSON API response, which will determine the appropriate template and data.

Project Overview:
The app will be built using approximately 15 page templates.
Utilize approximately 30 JSON API calls
Features include location-based services, OAuth authentication, two-factor authentication (2FA), Google Maps integration, and data visualization (bar and pie charts).
We will provide all API documentation and JSON responses required for integration.
The project will be developed in four phases:
Project Phases:
Phase 1: Design and develop the UI for the first five page templates.
Phase 2: Integrate these five templates with the JSON API.
Phase 3: Design and develop the remaining 15 templates.
Phase 4: Final testing and submission to the App Store & Google Play.

Requirements:
Proficiency in React Native, Flutter, or native Swift (iOS) & Kotlin (Android).
Experience implementing modern UI/UX based on provided wireframes.
Strong understanding of RESTful API integration and JSON parsing.
Experience with OAuth and 2FA authentication.
Ability to integrate Google Maps and data visualizations (charts/graphs).
Familiarity with App Store & Play Store submission processes.
Ideal Candidate:
Proven experience developing high-performance mobile apps.
Strong UI/UX skills with attention to detail.
Experience with state management (Redux, Provider, Riverpod, etc.).
Ability to optimize app performance and ensure smooth UI interactions.
Deliverables:
Phase 1: UI designs for the first five templates.
Phase 2: API-integrated version of these five templates.
Phase 3: Completion of all remaining templates.
Phase 4: Submission to the App Store & Google Play.

Attached is a design of the various page templates to be created.   API JSON documentation will be provided after award unless you have any specific questions.

If you're interested, please apply with:

Examples of past mobile app projects.
Your preferred development framework (React Native, Flutter, or Native).
Your estimated timeline for each phase.
We look forward to working with a talented developer to bring this project to life!

Developers contacting us outside this app by any other method will be disqualified.
skills: ['UX & UI', 'In-App Purchases', 'Mobile App Design', 'iOS', 'Mobile App Development', 'User Authentication', 'Flutter']

title: Flutter Developer for Bookstore App with Firebase Backend & Clean Architecture
description:
We are looking for an experienced Flutter developer to build a Bookstore App with a Firebase backend following Clean Architecture principles.

Project Overview:
The app will allow users to browse, search, and purchase books while maintaining a seamless user experience. The backend will be powered entirely by Firebase, ensuring real-time data sync, authentication, and storage. The codebase must follow clean architecture with proper separation of concerns and unit & widget testing to ensure reliability.

Responsibilities:

Develop the Flutter frontend with a clean UI/UX.
Implement Firebase Authentication (Google, Email/Password).
Use Firestore for real-time database storage.
Integrate payment processing using Stripe or RevenueCat for book purchases and subscriptions.
Ensure app performance optimization and smooth animations.

Requirements:
Strong experience in Flutter & Dart.
Hands-on experience with Firebase (Firestore, Auth, Storage).
Deep understanding of Clean Architecture principles.
Experience with State Management (Provider, Riverpod, or Bloc).
Experience with Stripe or RevenueCat for in-app purchases and subscriptions.

Deliverables:
A well-structured app.
Fully functional Firebase integration (Auth, Firestore, Storage).
Stripe or RevenueCat payment integration for book purchases.

Estimated Timeline: How to Apply:

Please share:
Your previous Flutter projects (preferably with Firebase).
Your availability & estimated completion time.

title: Setup Firebase Authentication for Capacitor App on iOS
description:
I am looking for an experienced developer to assist with setting up Firebase Authentication in my Capacitor application for iOS.

The ideal candidate must have experience with Capacitor and Firebase. Experience with Angular and NX would be a bonus.

I would need you to join a VIDEO call and guide me through the steps required to make authentication working (I'll be sharing my screen). But you can prepare using repo of my app - https://github.com/sneat-co/sneat-apps

At the moment I'm using https://github.com/capawesome-team/capacitor-firebase and it allows me to open native "Sign in with Apple" flow. But it is hanging when I'm trying to sign in with Google.

The working solution should support:

- Sign in with Apple (using native UI on iOS app)
- Sign in with Google (using native UI on iOS app)
- Sign in with Microsoft (optional)
- Sign in with phone (desirable but not strictly required)

The authentication should work for bot web app and the iOS app. The Android app is out of scope for now but if we progress quickly and you have time we might extend to setting that as well.

If you can make Firebase authentication to work on iOS emulator with local Firebase auth emulator please let me know in your bid - that is very desirable and would be a huge advantage for your bid.

Ideally I'd like to establish long term relationship so I can regularly request consultation for 1-2 hours per week.

I'm an experienced software developer  and expect this job to take 1-4 hours. I'm happy to pay minimum 2 hours if we make it quicker. Let me know if you believe it should take longer than 4 hours.

title: Development of a Skill Based Real Money Gaming App Similar to Rush
description:
Project Title: Development of a Skill-Based Real Money Gaming App Similar to Rush

Project Overview: We aim to develop a mobile gaming application that offers users the opportunity to play skill-based games and win real cash prizes, similar to the Rush app. The platform will provide a variety of popular games, ensuring a seamless, engaging, and secure user experience.

Key Features:



User Registration and Profile Management:
Simple sign-up process using mobile numbers and OTP verification.
Customizable user profiles with avatars.
Game Portfolio:
A selection of skill-based games such as Ludo, Carrom, Call Break, Snakes & Ladders, Pool, and Archery.
Regular updates to introduce new games and features.
Real Money Transactions:
Secure integration with payment gateways for deposits and withdrawals via UPI, wallets, and bank transfers.
Instant withdrawal processing to users' bank accounts.
Fair Play and Security:
Implementation of RNG (Random Number Generation) certification to ensure unbiased game outcomes.
Anti-cheat mechanisms to prevent fraudulent activities.
Tournaments and Rewards:
Daily and weekly tournaments with varying entry fees, including free-entry options.
Referral programs rewarding users for inviting friends.
User Support:
24x7 customer support through chat and email.
Comprehensive FAQs and help sections.
Platform Compatibility:
Native applications for both Android and iOS platforms.
Responsive design to accommodate various device sizes and orientations.
Notifications and Updates:
Push notifications for game updates, promotions, and user alerts.
In-app announcements for upcoming tournaments and events.
Community and Social Features:
In-game chat functionality for player interaction.
Leaderboards showcasing top players and their earnings.
Technical Requirements:



Backend Development:
Robust server infrastructure to handle high traffic and real-time gameplay.
Secure databases for storing user information and transaction records.
Frontend Development:
Intuitive and user-friendly interface with smooth navigation.
High-quality graphics and animations for an immersive experience.
Security Measures:
Data encryption to protect user information.
Regular security audits and compliance with relevant regulations.
Project Deliverables:



Fully functional mobile applications for Android and iOS.
Admin dashboard for managing games, users, and financial transactions.
Comprehensive documentation, including user manuals and technical specifications.


Budget:



Please provide a detailed cost estimate, including development, testing, deployment, and any ongoing maintenance fees.


Proposal Requirements:



Detailed project plan with milestones and timelines.
Breakdown of costs associated with each development phase.
Portfolio showcasing similar projects or relevant experience.
References or testimonials from previous clients.
Submission Deadline:



Please submit your proposals by 6th March


We look forward to collaborating with a skilled development team to bring this project to fruition.

title: Flutter Developer Needed For Custom App
description:
Project Overview:
We are seeking a developer to build a minimum viable product (MVP) using Flutter for both iOS and Android platforms. The app is designed to connect end users with on-demand services through a streamlined and secure interface. The focus is on quick and efficient service management rather than a conventional delivery platform.

Key Features & Requirements:
‚Ä¢ User Access & Authentication:
‚Ä¢ Secure registration and login for end users.
‚Ä¢ A separate login interface for service providers to manage orders and indicate availability.
‚Ä¢ Service Request Module:
‚Ä¢ Allow end users to place orders for various on-demand services.
‚Ä¢ Enable detailed service requests, including the ability to create lists with photo attachments for clarity.
‚Ä¢ Communication:
‚Ä¢ Provide integrated or link-based communication options for voice, text, and video calls.
‚Ä¢ Tapping these options should redirect users to external communication platforms for real-time contact.
‚Ä¢ Order Management & Tracking:
‚Ä¢ Display order status with the option of a live tracking feature or status updates to inform users of progress.
‚Ä¢ Include a scheduling/calendar system for advanced order placement and time slot selection.
‚Ä¢ Partner/Advertisement Section:
‚Ä¢ Include a dedicated area where local partners can advertise and offer promotions to users.
‚Ä¢ UI/UX Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Deliver a clean, simple, and intuitive design with consistent branding across both end-user and service provider interfaces.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the UI is easy to navigate and optimized for both iOS and Android devices.
‚Ä¢ Backend & Integration:
‚Ä¢ Use free or low-cost backend services (such as Firebase) for authentication, real-time data, and push notifications.
‚Ä¢ Leverage open-source libraries and simple link-based integrations to maintain a lean and cost-effective solution.
‚Ä¢ Budget & Timeline:
‚Ä¢ Develop the entire project as an MVP under a $1K budget.
‚Ä¢ Focus on rapid development and deployment with room for future scalability.

Expectations:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience with Flutter for cross-platform app development.
‚Ä¢ Ability to integrate all outlined features efficiently while keeping the design simple and cost-effective.
‚Ä¢ Clear and ongoing communication regarding development progress and any challenges.

Note:
If this project takes off, it will evolve into a full-time position requiring ongoing app maintenance and updates.

title: Augmented Reality App Development with Zappar
description:
**Job Description: Lead Zappar Developer for Augmented Reality (AR) Application**  

We are seeking a highly skilled **Lead Zappar Developer** with extensive experience in augmented reality (AR) development to join our team for an exciting project: the creation of an immersive AR application using **Zappar**. This project involves designing and developing interactive AR experiences that integrate seamlessly with real-world triggers, such as QR codes or image targets. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AR development, particularly with Zappar, and a proven track record of delivering high-quality, user-friendly AR applications.  

This is a fully remote, project-based role, and the candidate will work closely with our creative and technical teams to ensure the successful implementation of the AR features.  

---

### **üîπ Project Timeline:**  
2 months  

---

### **üîπ Key Responsibilities:**  

#### **‚úÖ Phase 1 ‚Äì AR Concept Development & Planning**  
- Collaborate with the team to define the AR experience's scope, functionality, and user interaction design.  
- Develop a detailed project plan, including timelines, deliverables, and technical requirements.  

#### **‚úÖ Phase 2 ‚Äì AR Development with Zappar**  
- Design and develop interactive AR experiences using **Zappar Studio** and **ZapWorks**.  
- Integrate 3D models, animations, and multimedia content (images, videos, audio) into the AR application.  
- Ensure compatibility with QR codes, image targets, or other triggers for seamless user interaction.  

#### **‚úÖ Phase 3 ‚Äì Testing & Optimization**  
- Conduct thorough testing of the AR application to ensure smooth functionality across all devices and platforms.  
- Optimize the AR experience for performance, including load times, frame rates, and user interaction responsiveness.  

#### **‚úÖ Phase 4 ‚Äì Final Delivery & Documentation**  
- Deliver the final AR application, including all source files, assets, and documentation.  
- Provide a user guide and technical documentation for future maintenance and updates.  

---

### **üîπ Technologies & Tools:**  
- **AR Development:** Zappar Studio, ZapWorks, WebAR.  
- **3D Modeling & Animation:** Blender, Maya, or similar (for asset preparation).  
- **Web Development:** HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+).  
- **Version Control:** GitHub.  

---

### **üîπ KPI System ‚Äì Performance-Based Deliverables**  
The Lead Zappar Developer will be responsible for meeting key performance indicators (KPIs) to ensure the project stays on track and meets quality standards.  

#### **KPI: Task Completion Rate (%)**  
- **Definition:** Measures the percentage of assigned tasks completed on time versus those delayed.  
- **Formula:** (Tasks Completed on Time / Total Tasks Assigned) √ó 100  
- **Goal:** 90% of tasks should be completed within the deadline.  

#### **Actions:**  
If the Task Completion Rate falls below 75%, the contract may be reviewed or terminated to ensure accountability and performance-driven execution.  

---

### **üí∞ Payment & Milestones:**  
The payment structure is based on performance-based milestones to ensure efficiency and quality.  

#### **üîπ Milestone 1: AR Concept & Planning (20%)**  
- Delivery of a detailed project plan, including scope, functionality, and technical requirements.  

#### **üîπ Milestone 2: AR Development (40%)**  
- Completion of AR experience development using Zappar, including integration of 3D models, animations, and multimedia content.  
- QR code or image target functionality fully operational.  

#### **üîπ Milestone 3: Testing & Optimization (20%)**  
- Successful testing and optimization of the AR application across all devices and platforms.  

#### **üîπ Milestone 4: Final Delivery & Documentation (20%)**  
- Delivery of the final AR application, source files, assets, and documentation.  

---

### **üìå Mandatory Requirements:**  
‚úÖ Proven experience in AR development using **Zappar Studio** and **ZapWorks**.  
‚úÖ Strong knowledge of 3D modeling and animation tools (Blender, Maya, etc.).  
‚úÖ Proficiency in web development technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript).  
‚úÖ Experience with multimedia integration (images, videos, audio) in AR applications.  
‚úÖ Strong understanding of AR triggers, such as QR codes and image targets.  
‚úÖ Excellent English (written and spoken).  
‚úÖ Ability to work under a performance-based milestone system.  

---

### **üì© How to Apply?**  
üìå Please provide:  
- Your portfolio showcasing previous AR projects developed with Zappar.  
- Examples of AR experiences you have created, including details on triggers and user interactions.  
- Your approach to integrating 3D models and multimedia content into AR applications.  
- Your experience with testing and optimizing AR experiences for performance.  

---

**üöÄ If you are passionate about creating cutting-edge AR experiences and have the skills to deliver high-quality applications using Zappar, apply now to join our team!**

title: FlutterFlow & Firestore Expert for Asana-Integrated Kitchen Operations App (Ongoing Projects)
description:
We are a company that continually develops internal software for our staff and customers. Our current application, built on Retool, integrates Asana tasks with our kitchen operations through checklists, prepsheets, on-demand lists, and an ‚ÄúOther‚Äù resource section. We‚Äôre now looking to migrate this system to FlutterFlow, leveraging Firestore for real-time syncing and scalability.

What You‚Äôll Do

-Migrate the existing Retool prototype to FlutterFlow, preserving all functionality (Deputy API for staff, Asana for tasks, JotForm for checklists).
-Set up Firestore as the intermediary between Asana and FlutterFlow, ensuring real-time updates without creating update loops.
-Implement webhook handling from JotForm to Firestore, then sync to Asana for task completion.
-Maintain and enhance the application over time, adding features as needed.
-Collaborate via Asana (project management) and Slack (communication) once onboarded.


Skills & Experience

-Proven FlutterFlow experience, including building responsive UIs and handling real-time data with Firestore.
-Familiarity with Asana‚Äôs API, Deputy‚Äôs API, and JotForm webhooks.
-Experience with server-side scripting (e.g., Google Apps Script or Cloud Functions) to facilitate data syncing.
-Strong communication, problem-solving, and an interest in a long-term, project-based partnership.

Timeline & Budget

- We‚Äôd like to begin immediately. The core migration should take no more than 4 weeks.
- Budget is negotiable; fixed for the initial migration, then hourly or retainer for ongoing maintenance and new features.

How to Apply

-Send a brief cover letter highlighting your FlutterFlow/Firestore experience and how you‚Äôd approach our migration.
-Include your portfolio or relevant examples of work with real-time apps and third-party API integrations.
-If we see a fit, we‚Äôll invite you for an interview to discuss technical details.
-Once selected, you‚Äôll join our Asana and Slack to start collaborating.

If you‚Äôre excited about helping us build out and maintain our kitchen operations platform, please apply‚Äîwe look forward to hearing from you!
skills: ['Smartphone', 'FlutterFlow', 'In-App Purchases', 'Firebase Cloud Firestore', 'iOS Development', 'Firebase', 'iOS', 'Mobile App Development', 'API Integration']

title: iOS Developer
description:
CONTACT THROUGH UPWORK ONLY! MUST BE OPEN TO POTENTIAL EMPLOYMENT.

UK WORKING HOURS.
------------------------------------

iOS Lead - HiiKER

Location: Remote

About HiiKER:
HiiKER is a premier hiking app available on Android, iOS, and the web. Our platform offers curated hikes, trail planning, and GPS-based hike recording. We pride ourselves on integrating popular maps from global providers and ensuring our users can rely on our app even in offline environments.

Role:
We are seeking an experienced iOS Lead to take charge of our Swift-based iOS application. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of iOS development, particularly in UIKit and SwiftUI, and will be comfortable working with various design patterns and libraries. As the primary iOS developer, you will be responsible for maintaining the current app, implementing new features, and ensuring the app remains reliable in offline scenarios.

Must be ready for hardcore work . You will be paid for 40 hours but at least 50 will be required.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Maintain and enhance the existing Swift iOS app.
2. Collaborate with the backend team to ensure seamless integration with our Ruby on Rails backend via GraphQL.
3. Manage dependencies using the Swift package manager, including both open-source libraries and HiiKER's private repositories.
4. Work with Mapbox for map functionalities, including managing stylesheets, sources, and layers.
5. Implement and manage offline capabilities, including caching GraphQL queries and offline map functionalities.
6. Ensure the app's compatibility across different environments: Development, Staging, and Production.
7. Continuously test, debug, and optimize the app for performance and user experience.

Qualifications:

1. Proven experience in iOS development, with a strong portfolio of apps (preferably in the outdoor or mapping domain).
2. Proficiency in Swift, with hands-on experience in both UIKit and SwiftUI.
3. Familiarity with design patterns, especially as they relate to iOS development.
4. Experience with Mapbox or similar mapping software.
5. Knowledge of CoreData and its applications in offline scenarios.
6. Experience with GraphQL and understanding of caching mechanisms.
7. Familiarity with SD Web Image or similar libraries for image caching.
8. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
9. Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
10. Knowledge of GIS, Geojson, and the various geometries that can be contained in geojson geometries.

Nice to Have:

1. A passion for hiking or outdoor activities.
2. Experience with other mapping providers like Ordnance Survey, USGS, etc.
3. Knowledge of AWS and cloud-based infrastructure.

title: Develop an Uber-like Ride Service App for College Towns
description:
Hi, I live in a college town where partying and drinking downtown is the culture. The town is small enough where uber is not an option for getting short rides for cheap. The solution that the people have created is a massive group chat where riders and drivers find each other and DM from there. There are obvious safety and communication problems with the groupchat. I figured I could solve those problems by making a ride-hailing app that is only accessible to students with a verified school email.

I am basically looking for an Uber clone app that is optimized for college towns. I would need it to be IOS and Android accessible along with the following requirements.

PROJECT AIMS: To develop a secure, efficient ride-sharing platform exclusively for GCSU students that addresses current system pain points:
Streamline driver-rider matching through real-time location tracking
Ensure safety through school email verification and rating systems
Standardize pricing with automated calculations
Enable clear communication between parties
Provide immediate access to emergency services
Maintain transparency in payment processing

SUCCESS MEASURES: Technical Requirements:
100% school email authentication rate
Real-time location accuracy within 10 meters
Sub-second response time for emergency buttons
Maximum 30-second matching time for riders/drivers (given that match is available)
99.9% uptime for critical features
Zero data breaches
Functional Goals:
User verification completes in less than 1 minute
All rides tracked from start to finish
Automatic receipt generation
Rating system captures all completed rides
Price calculations match specified range ($9-30)
Clear display of vehicle capacity
Instant messaging/calling between matched pairs
Successful payment processing with 5% business split
Quality Metrics:
less than 1% failed ride matches
less than 2% payment processing errors
Emergency button response time less than 3 seconds
Platform accessibility 24/7



The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in mobile app development, with proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Kotlin, or React Native. Experience with back-end development and database management is also highly desirable. A proven track record of delivering high-quality applications, along with a passion for enhancing transportation solutions within academic communities, is essential for this role.
skills: ['Smartphone', 'Android', 'In-App Purchases', 'iOS Development', 'iOS', 'Mobile App Development']

title: Full-Stack Developer for Customer & Driver Apps + Website (Similar to Instacart/Uber)
description:
Full-Stack Developer for Grocery Delivery Platform like Instacart / Uber

I am looking for a skilled Full-Stack Developer to build, test, and optimize mobile apps (Driver and Customer) and a web platform similar to Instacart or Uber. You will be responsible for developing a seamless and scalable platform that integrates key features such as live order tracking, dynamic driver routing, payment processing, and an anti-scraping mechanism to protect platform integrity. The role involves both frontend and backend development, along with API integrations for routing, payments, and location tracking.

Responsibilities:
- Develop, test and fix mobile applications (iOS & Android) for both customers and drivers, ensuring a smooth and functional user experience.
- Build a responsive and user-friendly web platform using React.js.
- Design and develop backend services and REST APIs with Node.js, ensuring high performance, reliability, and security.
- Integrate Stripe for payment processing, including handling virtual card transactions and other custom payment logic.
- Implement Google Maps API for real-time location tracking and dynamic routing for drivers.
- Design, implement, and manage a scalable database structure in MSSQL to handle transactional and customer data.
- Develop and enforce anti-scraping mechanisms, including rate limiting, CAPTCHA, IP blocking, and content obfuscation.
- Perform extensive testing, debugging, and performance optimization for both the mobile apps and the web platform.
- Work closely with stakeholders to refine and improve user experiences based on data-driven insights.
- Ensure the platform is scalable and capable of handling high traffic volumes.
- Deploy and manage the application on AWS cloud infrastructure.
- Integrate and upload the REST API to the GoDaddy domain, ensuring proper configuration and deployment.

Skills & Requirements:
Frontend:
- Expertise in React.js for building an intuitive, responsive, and visually appealing web interface.

Backend:
- Strong experience with Node.js for developing efficient and scalable backend systems.
- Experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs.

Payment Integration:
- Proficiency in integrating Stripe for payment processing, including virtual card payments and custom customer algorithms.

Payment Integration:
- Proficiency in integrating Stripe for payment processing, including virtual card payments and custom customer algorithms.
- Ability to customize Stripe to assign virtual or physical cards to drivers after onboarding.
- Knowledge of implementing security deposit logic, where double the order amount is temporarily charged to customers for security and the remaining balance is refunded after delivery.

Routing & Location Tracking:
- Expertise in integrating Google Maps API for real-time tracking and optimizing driver routing.

Database:
- Experience with MSSQL for managing and storing large volumes of transactional and customer data.

Cloud Infrastructure:
- Familiarity with AWS for cloud hosting, infrastructure management, and deployment.

UI/UX Design:
- Strong understanding of UI/UX best practices to create seamless and intuitive user interfaces.
- Experience with animations to enhance user engagement and interactivity.

Security & Anti-Scraping Mechanisms:
- Knowledge of implementing anti-scraping techniques such as rate limiting, CAPTCHA, IP blocking, and content obfuscation.

Testing & Debugging:

Additional Skills:

Preferred Qualifications:

- Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure on AWS.
- Proven track record of integrating APIs for payment processing, mapping, and routing.
- Strong focus on security, especially regarding data protection and platform integrity.

Project Details:

- APIs: Google Maps API for routing and location tracking

- Domain Deployment: Integration and upload to GoDaddy domain

We are looking for a proactive developer who can bring technical expertise and creative problem-solving skills to this project. If you have experience in building high-performance platforms with secure and scalable architectures, we would love to hear from you!

title: Experienced Android Developer Needed | Background Caller ID & SMS Sync App (Truecaller + CRM)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Android developer to build a small background app that automatically fetches caller ID data from Truecaller and syncs it with our CRM system.

Project Scope:
. Detect Incoming Calls & SMS ‚Äì Log all incoming/missed calls & SMS.
. Extract Caller ID from Truecaller ‚Äì Use OCR or Accessibility Service to fetch caller name & number.
. Save & Sync Data to CRM ‚Äì Push leads via API, webhook, or Google Sheets.
. Work in Background ‚Äì The app should run silently without user intervention.
. Offline Storage & Sync ‚Äì If no internet, store data locally & sync when online.

Technical Requirements:
. Android Development: Kotlin or Java
. Call & SMS Logging: Android Call Log API & SMS Provider API
. Truecaller Data Extraction: Use Android Accessibility Service
.CRM Integration: REST API / Webhooks
. Database: SQLite, Firebase, or MySQL (for temporary data storage)

Ideal Candidate:
. Experience with background services & notification listeners.
. Strong knowledge of OCR or Android Accessibility APIs.
. Familiar with API integrations & data syncing (Google Sheets, Firebase, or CRM systems).
. Experience with handling call & SMS logs securely.
. Can deliver a lightweight, battery-efficient app.

How to Apply:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Share your experience with similar Android apps.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Tell us how you would fetch Truecaller data.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Provide links to past work (if available).

Bonus: If you have experience with call recording & Google Drive API integration, let us know!
skills: ['Smartphone', 'Android App Development', 'Android', 'iOS Development', 'iOS']

title: Pro Mobile Developer for an MVP
description:
Description:
I‚Äôm seeking a talented mobile developer to build the MVP for MigMap, an app that tracks U.S. migration data‚Äîfocusing on illegal entries (2021‚Äì2024) and deportations (2025 onward). Think interactive U.S. map, simple tabs, and charts, inspired by the Johns Hopkins COVID dashboard. Goal to Launch on Memorial Day, May 26, 2025,

Scope of Work:
App: Cross-platform (iPhone/Android) built with React Native and Mapbox.
Core Features:
Interactive U.S. map with tappable states (e.g., ‚ÄúTX: 500K illegals in, 50K deported out‚Äù).
‚ÄúFrom‚Äù tab: Illegal entries‚Äô origins and data (2021‚Äì2024).
‚ÄúGo‚Äù tab: Deportations and outflows (2025+).
Bar chart for quick totals (e.g., ‚Äú1M in, 500K out‚Äù).
Monetization: Free version with a bottom banner ad slot; $5/month premium for county-level data.
Data: Public CBP (encounters) and ICE (deportations) datasets‚ÄîExcel files provided.
Timeline: 2 months‚Äîstart March 17, 2025, deliver by May 26, 2025.
Budget: $15,000 total‚Äî$7,500 upfront (March 17), $7,500 on completion (May 26).

Who You Are:
Expert in React Native and Mapbox‚Äîplease share a link to a live app you‚Äôve built.
Comfortable integrating public datasets (Excel/CSV) into a clean UI.
Able to deliver high-quality work on a tight deadline.
Preferred: Based in the Bay Area or Sacramento (I‚Äôm in Live Oak, 1‚Äì1.5 hours from SF/Sac)‚Äîopen to in-person meetings if needed. Remote candidates welcome, but local preferred.
Rate: $60‚Äì$75/hour, 200‚Äì250 hours total.

Why This Project:
MigMap is my way of giving back after 15 years in the U.S. I am an Irish Immigrant to the US‚Äîand feel there is a great need for a transparent tool displaying real world migration data, free from spin. Your skills will make it real.

How to Apply:

Share a link to your best mobile app (ideally with maps or data viz).
Briefly explain your approach to this project and hitting the May 26 deadline.
Confirm your hourly rate and availability starting March 17.
Bonus if you‚Äôre local‚Äîlet‚Äôs meet for coffee in SF or Sac!
skills: ['iOS Development', 'iOS', 'Android', 'Smartphone']

title: Mobile Automation Engineer for High-Volume Project
description:
We‚Äôre seeking an experienced Mobile Automation Engineer to help build, refine, and scale our multi-platform social media automation system. The project involves complex scripting and API integrations across multiple, well-known social networks‚Äîencompassing everything from multi-account management (including ‚Äúmother‚Äìchild‚Äù strategies) to scheduling tools, anti-detection measures, and proxy management. Our previous developer left the work unfinished, so we need someone to audit the existing code, address gaps, and bring the system to full functionality at scale.



Key Responsibilities

1. Platform Automations

- Automate login flows, posting, likes, comments, and DMs across multiple mobile applications.

- Manage large volumes of accounts, using mother‚Äìchild methods to funnel traffic, drive engagement, and scale to thousands of simultaneous sessions.

2. Mobile App Cloning & Device Farms

- Develop or refine solutions to run multiple cloned app instances per device or emulator.

- Integrate with a physical device farm (or virtual environment) handling dozens‚Äîor even hundreds‚Äîof phones.

3. Anti-Detection & Proxy Management

- Implement dynamic IP rotation (e.g., 4G proxies), device fingerprinting, and timing randomization to avoid bans.

- Familiarity with advanced stealth techniques, such as traffic shaping and session management.

4. Scheduling & Dashboard

- Create or improve a user-friendly interface for managing tasks (mass posting, following, etc.).

- Implement flexible scheduling for large-scale account actions, including rotation and random intervals.


5. Codebase Audit & Refactoring

- Review existing scripts (possibly built with Appium or similar frameworks) to identify critical fixes.

- Refactor code for reliability, performance, and easier long-term maintenance.


6.  Optional AI Integration

- Utilize NLP models (e.g., OpenAI or other solutions) to generate natural-sounding content (captions, comments).

- Provide suggestions on how to integrate AI for more authentic user interactions or comment generation.


Required Skills & Experience

1. Mobile Automation

- Hands-on experience with Appium, Selenium, or comparable frameworks.

- Proficiency in Python or Java (or both), plus knowledge of Android toolsets (ADB, emulators, etc.).


2. Multi-Platform Social Media Knowledge

- Background in automating at least one major social or video-sharing app.

- Understanding of ban mitigation (device fingerprinting, IP rotation) and how to handle repeated login flows.


3. Scaling & Performance

- Comfortable orchestrating hundreds or thousands of concurrent sessions.

- Experience with phone farms or advanced proxy networks.


4. Security & Credential Management

- Familiarity with secure storage of account credentials and tokens.

- Ability to implement robust logging and error-handling.


5. Strong Communication & Collaboration

- Clear documentation and frequent updates on milestones.

- Willing to work with an agile or milestone-based approach, providing demos and prototypes regularly.
skills: ['Python', 'Performance Testing', 'Java', 'Load Testing', 'Test Results & Analysis', 'Android', 'WordPress', 'Bug Tracking & Reports', 'Appium', 'Data Scraping', 'Android Debug Bridge', 'Lead Generation', 'API Testing', 'JavaScript', 'Web Testing']
